1.name: Level up
1.description: Learned when a Pokémon reaches a certain level.

2.name: Egg
2.description: Appears on a newly-hatched Pokémon, if the father had the same move.

3.name: Tutor
3.description: Can be taught at any time by an NPC.

4.name: Machine
4.description: Can be taught at any time by using a TM or HM.

5.name: Stadium: Surfing Pikachu
5.description: Learned when a non-rental Pikachu helps beat Prime Cup Master Ball R-2.  It must participate in every battle, and you must win with no continues.

6.name: Volt Tackle Pichu
6.description: Appears on a Pichu whose mother was holding a Light Ball.  The father cannot be Ditto.

7.name: Colosseum: Purification
7.description: Appears on a Shadow Pokémon as it becomes increasingly purified.

8.name: XD: Shadow
8.description: Appears on a Snatched Shadow Pokémon.

9.name: XD: Purification
9.description: Appears on a Shadow Pokémon as it becomes increasingly purified.

10.name: Form Change
10.description: Appears when Rotom or Cosplay Pikachu changes form.  Disappears if the Pokémon becomes another form and this move can only be learned by form change.
